data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_0
data.text: CURT! OH... I FORGOT WE WERE GOING TO PLAY TENNIS!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_1
data.text: WELL... OKAY, HONEY! I'D JUST AS SOON GO FOR A DRIVE, ANYWAY!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_2
data.text:
I WAS IN A BAD MOOD, AND CURT
                SENSED IT IMMEDIATELY...

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_3
data.text: YOU'VE SEEMED SO UNHAPPY LATELY, CUNTHY! I WISH THERE WAS SOMETHING I COULD DO! I WISH YOU'D LET ME TRY AND MAKE YOU HAPPY!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_4
data.text:
I KNEW WHAT WAS COMING, BUT I
                DIDN'T WANT TO GIVE HIM AN ANSWER... NOT
                THEN. I TRIED TO CHANGE THE MOOD!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_5
data.text: GOODNESS, CURT, YOU WORRY ABOUT ME TOO MUCH! C'MON, LET'S GO FOR A SWIM!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_6
data.text: I LIKED CURT BUT I DIDN'T LOVE HIM, AND I KNEW THAT MARRYING HIM WOULD ONLY BE A SURRENDER TO MY PARENTS. I HAD TO LICK THIS PROBLEM MYSELF ... NOT GIVE IN TO IT! LATER THAT EVENING, WE DROPPED IN AT GLORIA'S. EVERYBODY GATHERED AT GLORIA'S..

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_8
data.text: SPARKLING WIT... BRILLIANT CONVERSATION... PENETRATING THOUGHT... WHAT DID YOU EXPECT?

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_9
data.text: HE MEANS IT'S THE USUAL DULL EVENING!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_11
data.text: MY OLD MAN SAYS I'M GOING TO HAVE TO TAKE THAT ADVERTISING JOB IN NEW YORK!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_12
data.text: YEAH, ME, TOO! HE'LL TAKE ME ON AT THE BANK, BUT I THINK I'D RATHER WORK IN MY UNCLE'S PUBLISHING HOUSE!

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_13
data.text: DIT IT EVER OCCUR TO YOU THAT YOU'RE LUCKY TO GET JOBS?

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_14
data.text: LUCKY? MY OLD MAN'S GOT ENOUGH DOUGH TO SUPPORT HALF THIS TOWN! WHY SHOULD I WANT TO WORK?

data.name: PIKE_BOYLOVEGIRLS_T41_012_15
data.text: IF YOU DON'T KNOW, I'M NOT GOING TO TELL YOU!
